title: How to write two billion thirty four million and ten - Quora

response.answer_text: In what system, the long or short system? Most Europeans use the long system, where a billion is (1 000 000)² (bi-llion literally means two millions) and the US, the UK and some other countries use the short system, where a billion is one thousand million (1 000 000 000). So, in Europe two billion four million and ten is 2 000 034 000 010. In the US and UK, its 2 034 000 010.

It depends if you’re British or American. British- billion = a million million: 1,000,000,000,000 American-billion = a thousand million: 1,000,000,000 British = 2,000,000,000,000 + 34,000,000 + 10 = 2,000,034,000,010 American = 2,000,000,000 + 34,000,000 + 10 = 2,034,000,010
